cause.description:
The teachings of Goat will better your life in both spirit and charactor!
Just because I am crazy.... doesn't mean I'm wrong! Einstien was crazy..... Christopher collombus was crazy....
My ideas do not differ from thoughs of Jesus and Budda.... Rather they Combine everything that makes since of the two of them!
Humans have a way of misinturpiting things! God did not say donate 15% of your salary to his house! Get past the crap and listen to the messages! This is what I have tried to do!
1. Leader
2. Teachers
3. Followers
cause.mission: To obtain 100 000 followers! Thus becoming a religion rather then a cult!
cause.name: Goat Following
